vernac_cmds: Theorem Rcompare_F2R : forall e m1 m2 : Z, Rcompare (F2R (Float beta m1 e)) (F2R (Float beta m2 e)) = Zcompare m1 m2.
Theorem F2R_le_reg : forall e m1 m2 : Z, (F2R (Float beta m1 e) <= F2R (Float beta m2 e))%R -> (m1 <= m2)%Z.
Theorem F2R_le_compat : forall m1 m2 e : Z, (m1 <= m2)%Z -> (F2R (Float beta m1 e) <= F2R (Float beta m2 e))%R.
Theorem F2R_lt_reg : forall e m1 m2 : Z, (F2R (Float beta m1 e) < F2R (Float beta m2 e))%R -> (m1 < m2)%Z.
Theorem F2R_lt_compat : forall e m1 m2 : Z, (m1 < m2)%Z -> (F2R (Float beta m1 e) < F2R (Float beta m2 e))%R.
Theorem F2R_eq_compat : forall e m1 m2 : Z, (m1 = m2)%Z -> (F2R (Float beta m1 e) = F2R (Float beta m2 e))%R.
now apply (f_equal (fun m => F2R (Float beta m e))).
Theorem F2R_eq_reg : forall e m1 m2 : Z, F2R (Float beta m1 e) = F2R (Float beta m2 e) -> m1 = m2.
apply Zle_antisym ; apply F2R_le_reg with e ; rewrite H ; apply Rle_refl.
Theorem F2R_Zabs: forall m e : Z, F2R (Float beta (Zabs m) e) = Rabs (F2R (Float beta m e)).
Theorem F2R_Zopp : forall m e : Z, F2R (Float beta (Zopp m) e) = Ropp (F2R (Float beta m e)).
Theorem F2R_0 : forall e : Z, F2R (Float beta 0 e) = 0%R.
Theorem F2R_eq_0_reg : forall m e : Z, F2R (Float beta m e) = 0%R -> m = Z0.
Theorem F2R_ge_0_reg : forall m e : Z, (0 <= F2R (Float beta m e))%R -> (0 <= m)%Z.
Theorem F2R_le_0_reg : forall m e : Z, (F2R (Float beta m e) <= 0)%R -> (m <= 0)%Z.
Theorem F2R_gt_0_reg : forall m e : Z, (0 < F2R (Float beta m e))%R -> (0 < m)%Z.
Theorem F2R_lt_0_reg : forall m e : Z, (F2R (Float beta m e) < 0)%R -> (m < 0)%Z.
Theorem F2R_ge_0_compat : forall f : float beta, (0 <= Fnum f)%Z -> (0 <= F2R f)%R.
Theorem F2R_le_0_compat : forall f : float beta, (Fnum f <= 0)%Z -> (F2R f <= 0)%R.
Theorem F2R_gt_0_compat : forall f : float beta, (0 < Fnum f)%Z -> (0 < F2R f)%R.
Theorem F2R_lt_0_compat : forall f : float beta, (Fnum f < 0)%Z -> (F2R f < 0)%R.
Theorem F2R_neq_0_compat : forall f : float beta, (Fnum f <> 0)%Z -> (F2R f <> 0)%R.
Lemma Fnum_ge_0_compat: forall (f : float beta), (0 <= F2R f)%R -> (0 <= Fnum f)%Z.
Lemma Fnum_le_0_compat: forall (f : float beta), (F2R f <= 0)%R -> (Fnum f <= 0)%Z.
Theorem F2R_bpow : forall e : Z, F2R (Float beta 1 e) = bpow e.
Theorem bpow_le_F2R : forall m e : Z, (0 < m)%Z -> (bpow e <= F2R (Float beta m e))%R.
Theorem F2R_p1_le_bpow : forall m e1 e2 : Z, (0 < m)%Z -> (F2R (Float beta m e1) < bpow e2)%R -> (F2R (Float beta (m + 1) e1) <= bpow e2)%R.
apply Rle_trans with (F2R (Float beta m e1)).
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
Theorem bpow_le_F2R_m1 : forall m e1 e2 : Z, (1 < m)%Z -> (bpow e2 < F2R (Float beta m e1))%R -> (bpow e2 <= F2R (Float beta (m - 1) e1))%R.
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
Theorem F2R_lt_bpow : forall f : float beta, forall e', (Zabs (Fnum f) < Zpower beta (e' - Fexp f))%Z -> (Rabs (F2R f) < bpow e')%R.
Theorem F2R_change_exp : forall e' m e : Z, (e' <= e)%Z -> F2R (Float beta m e) = F2R (Float beta (m * Zpower beta (e - e')) e').
pattern e at 1 ; replace e with (e - e' + e')%Z by ring.

Theorem F2R_prec_normalize : forall m e e' p : Z, (Zabs m < Zpower beta p)%Z -> (bpow (e' - 1)%Z <= Rabs (F2R (Float beta m e)))%R -> F2R (Float beta m e) = F2R (Float beta (m * Zpower beta (e - e' + p)) (e' - p)).
intros m e e' p Hm Hf.
replace (e - e' + p)%Z with (e - (e' - p))%Z by ring.
Theorem ln_beta_F2R_bounds : forall x m e, (0 < m)%Z -> (F2R (Float beta m e) <= x < F2R (Float beta (m + 1) e))%R -> ln_beta beta x = ln_beta beta (F2R (Float beta m e)) :> Z.
destruct (ln_beta beta (F2R (Float beta m e))) as (ex, He).
Theorem ln_beta_F2R : forall m e : Z, m <> Z0 -> (ln_beta beta (F2R (Float beta m e)) = ln_beta beta (Z2R m) + e :> Z)%Z.

Theorem float_distribution_pos : forall m1 e1 m2 e2 : Z, (0 < m1)%Z -> (F2R (Float beta m1 e1) < F2R (Float beta m2 e2) < F2R (Float beta (m1 + 1) e1))%R -> (e2 < e1)%Z /\ (e1 + ln_beta beta (Z2R m1) = e2 + ln_beta beta (Z2R m2))%Z.
intros m1 e1 m2 e2 Hp1 (H12, H21).
apply (F2R_change_exp e1 m2 e2) in H0.
destruct (ln_beta beta (F2R (Float beta m1 e1))) as (e1', H1).
assert (H2 : (bpow (e1' - 1) <= F2R (Float beta m1 e1) < bpow e1')%R).
Theorem F2R_cond_Zopp : forall b m e, F2R (Float beta (cond_Zopp b m) e) = cond_Ropp b (F2R (Float beta m e)).
intros [|] m e ; unfold F2R ; simpl.

command: now apply (f_equal (fun m => F2R (Float beta m e))).
apply Zle_antisym ; apply F2R_le_reg with e ; rewrite H ; apply Rle_refl.
apply Rle_trans with (F2R (Float beta m e1)).
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
replace e2 with (e2 - e1 + e1)%Z by ring.
pattern e at 1 ; replace e with (e - e' + e')%Z by ring.
intros m e e' p Hm Hf.
replace (e - e' + p)%Z with (e - (e' - p))%Z by ring.
